answers.answer: It sounds like you might have a taste disorder of some type- I am not familiar with how to treat them, but I would start asking about that.

question: I have born with some kind of weird problem that I can't eat sugar because when I do, its taste bitter and make me throw up, I have gone to a lot of doctors and no one had known what's the problem or why it's happening. I hope you will help me to know what is wrong?.. thank youPs: I don't have diabetes or any chronic illness.
title: sugar taste as bitter since I was born
